com.delphix.masking.api.plugin.typeAdapters

Interface TypeAdapter<A,D>

  • Type Parameters:
    A - The algorithm data type
    D - The underlying data type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BigDecimalToDouble, BigDecimalToLong, BigDecimalToString, ByteBufferToBinary, ByteBufferToString, LocalDateTimeToBigDecimal, LocalDateTimeToDate, LocalDateTimeToDouble, LocalDateTimeToLong, LocalDateTimeToString, PassThroughAdapter, StringToBigDecimal, StringToBinary, StringToByteBuffer, StringToDate, StringToDouble, StringToLong

    public interface TypeAdapter<A,D>
    This is the general interface implemented by classes used internally by the masking framework to apply algorithms to data that is not of the type expected by the algorithm. The possible algorithm types are enumerated in MaskingAlgorithm.MaskingType, while the possible underlying types are enumerated in UnderlyingDataType.

    Each type adapter class implements a pair of type conversions. As each value to be masked requires a new TypeAdapter, a TypeAdapterFactory is typically used to create them. That class also maintains a list of available adapters classes.

    If a type conversion cannot be performed because the underlying value is empty or all-whitespace, the adapter should return null in underlyingToAlgorithm, but substitute the original empty value back in algorithmToUnderlying should the algorithm return null. This allows empty values to pass through unchanged, even when the algorithmType is not able to express such empty values. This is necessary, for example, when a Date algorithm is applied to String type underlying date.

    Since:
    1.3.0

      • algorithmToUnderlying

        D algorithmToUnderlying(A algorithmValue)
                 throws PostMaskTypeConversionException
        Convert an object from the algorithm type to the underlying type.
        Parameters:
        algorithmValue - An object of the type referenced by getAlgorithmType
        Returns:
        An object of the type referenced by getUnderlyingType
        Throws:
        PostMaskTypeConversionException - If the type conversion fails

      • underlyingToAlgorithm

        A underlyingToAlgorithm(D underlyingValue)
                 throws PreMaskTypeConversionException
        Convert an object from the underlying type to the algorithm type.
        Parameters:
        underlyingValue - An object of the type referenced by getUnderlyingType
        Returns:
        An object of the type referenced by getAlgorithmType
        Throws:
        PreMaskTypeConversionException - If the type conversion fails
